comments:
Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070118-0957

Description;
Switch between Error log and Property Editor view, and then click the bookmark property in Advanced Property of report item.Exception is thrown.

Step to reproduce:
1. open error log view
2. insert a text item in the report
3. go to Advanced Property page of the text item.
4. switch to the Error log view and switch back
5. Click the bookmark property in Advanced Property

Actual result:
